data.name: Indenture
data.detailed_description:
Story:

The Nishimura family resides in the quiet countryside far away from the city in Japan. A proud family with a history of Kendo and owns a Kendo Dojo, their name was famous and influential. That is of course until one day, tragic struck at their family. A haunting secret deal that was made by the family years ago has come to haunt them. How would the Nishimura family deal with this? Would it be the end of them or is there a way to save their reputation and their beloved Dojo?


  • Over 20 CGs + More.
  • Multiple Endings
  • Visually stunning backgrounds
  • 6 hours+ of gameplay
  • Eargasm background music for you to enjoy.
data.about_the_game:
Story:

The Nishimura family resides in the quiet countryside far away from the city in Japan. A proud family with a history of Kendo and owns a Kendo Dojo, their name was famous and influential. That is of course until one day, tragic struck at their family. A haunting secret deal that was made by the family years ago has come to haunt them. How would the Nishimura family deal with this? Would it be the end of them or is there a way to save their reputation and their beloved Dojo?


  • Over 20 CGs + More.

  • 6 hours+ of gameplay

data.short_description: A Visual novel game about Kendo and girls. And the bad decision made by their parents long time ago. Get yourself immerse in the game with visually stunning CG scene and rich story telling about the family of Nishimura.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 and Above
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
